synopsis.text:
Day Before Us" weaves a tale of four friends navigating the complexities of love and friendship. Ha Eun, a college student, finds herself unexpectedly seeking shelter from the rain under the umbrella of her classmate, Yeon Woo, leading to an awkward encounter. Unbeknownst to her, Yeon Woo is also friends with her cheerful and vivacious friend, Yeo Reum.

At a dinner invitation from Yeo Reum, Ha Eun and Yeon Woo cross paths again, their previous encounter casting a shadow over their interaction. As the evening progresses and Yeo Reum becomes inebriated, another friend, the kind-hearted Kim Wook, steps in to escort her home. Wook harbors feelings for Yeo Reum, but she is already smitten with someone else.

As the story unfolds, Ha Eun and Yeon Woo find themselves sharing a silent moment of understanding, hinting at a possible connection. Will love blossom between them, or will they continue to navigate their feelings in silence? Only time will reveal the answers as they journey through the intricate web of love and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
